title: ChatSphere
description: An  online forum platform with  user authentication, responsive design, and functionalities for posts, comments, and votes. Includes user and admin dashboards

title: CareKitchen
description: An online food sharing platform with  user authentication, responsive design, functionalities for adding, managing, and requesting food donations

title: CreativeCanvasHub
description: An online platform for sharing and managing art and craft items.This platform allows users to add, manage, and view art and craft items.

title: HavenlyHomes
description: An online platform for discovering and managing residential properties.The platform features a dynamic homepage, detailed property pages, and user-specific functionalities.

title: BookRiot
description: A book selling platform for to explore, manage, and interact with a wide range of books.This platform allows users to and wishlist.

title: Recipe Calories
description: An online platform where users can discover new recipes.The platform aims to provide users with a new way to explore different recipes, thereby creating a seamless experience for those interested in cooking.

title: NewsSphere
description: An online forum platform where users can read and engage with blog posts on various topics.

title: Greenline-Ticket
description: An online platform for booking bus tickets.This platform allows user to know about routes, book a bus ticket and user can apply coupon code.
